title: Advanced Diagnostics - Static IP Not Routing
description: A business customer reports that the static IP address for their server is unreachable from the internet.

tasks.description: Verify the static IP address assigned to the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct static IP address.

tasks.description: Check the routing configuration in the core network for the customer's static IP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the route for the static IP is not correctly propagated.

tasks.description: Escalate the issue to the IP engineering team to correct the routing configuration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-priority ticket with all relevant details for the IP engineering team.
